body_html: @soumith The reason I have been hesitated about doing this since the beginning (THD NCCL backend) is that every process needs a GPU access. If @SsnL only needs a barrier after init_process_group, I feel it's an overkill since there is no GPU access in "init_process_group". So ideally, for this case, the barrier should happen on the CPU. Of course I am open to hearing more suggestions and we can go with this easy solution if that unblocks people faster.
